EmailTemplate.subject: Is Your N+X Redundancy Optimized?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Ensuring Business Continuity: Intelligent N+X, Affinities, & Future-Proofing In The Virtualized Data Center 79% of IT Administrators Want to Quit Due to Stress Are you one of them {{lead.first name:default=}}?
The success of any modern business hinges upon the agility and empowerment provided by that business's IT organization. However, IT is also charged with ensuring and protecting the continuity of the business in the event of unpredictable disasters, and this responsibility bears legal ramifications. No wonder one-third of IT professionals regularly lose sleep!
VMTurbo's FREE whitepaper, Can You Really Support Business Continuity Requirements? Intelligent N+X Redundancy, Placement Affinities, & Future Proofing In the Virtualized Data Center <http://bit.ly/1ojkpea> was written with your sound sleep in mind.
